Articles.Content:
Chloroplasts.

You are very very very close. VERY close. Chrisd is also VERY close.

"I am the one who is dead, yet brings life to what brings life to you"

So it brings life to plants... Microorganisms?

No.

10char
Chlorophyll?

You are very very very close. VERY close. Chrisd is also VERY close.

Cells?

Tenchar
Xylem or phloem?

Chlorophyll?

Yes!

10char
Alright, let's get cracking. I've got one, I'll post it in a bit.
Ah, screw it. I can't figure out one, I forgot the other one... Anyone else is free to go.

I've got one,

The ground shakes

A deafening roar thunders through the towns

A blinding light pierces the heavens

Streaking across the sky like a shining star

What am I?
Well, a plane or a lightnig bolt. It can also be a comet Or ameteorite since it can hit the ground.

Well, a plane or a lightnig bolt. It can also be a comet Or ameteorite since it can hit the ground.

I think I am not good at riddles, that, or you got lucky and came EXTREMELY close,

One of your guesses is almost right on the money,

And what's an ameteroite?
A rocket launch?

A rocket launch?

No.

(ten char)
me when i land or is it a bomb hitting the ground
A volcano?
Hmm. I agree with Potato, it's probably a volcano, but I would guess... an asteroid? Nothing that good is left.
I'm going to assume cziken ment meteorite, in which case he is EXTREMLY close again.

Would you like someone to say the term, "shooting star"?

How about something specific, like that one in Russia a year or so ago?

Would you like someone to say the term, "shooting star"?

How about something specific, like that one in Russia a year or so ago?

No, does no one know what a rock that burns up in the atmospere without hitting the ground is actually called?

Well it's simply called meteor. (i always used my own names for all things in space, to make them more epic, i called meteor "The Fire Demon",a nd meteorite "The Fallen") Ah and yes i meant meteorite, ih cna't splimy wtire ehnlish. Well i almost always in ANY language while writing on a keyboard, make spelling mistakes.

Edited February 14, 2014 by cziken20
SPPELLING MISTAKES!!!!!

Well it's simply called meteor. (i always used my own names for all things in space, to make them more epic, i called meteor "The Fire Demon",a nd meteorite "The Fallen") Ah and yes i meant meteorite, ih cna't splimy wtire ehnlish. Well i almost always in ANY language while writing on a keyboard, make spelling mistakes.

Your turn now.

oh dammit why i always don't remember i can't make good riddles fast? Wait, i can think...

I am shouting, talking and singing, but i can't love nor live

I know more than you, no matter how clever were you

I am deeper than you thought,and philospohers, artists, writers- that is what i brought

I teched you a lot, and sometimes made your mind simply be triple dot

Who am I?

I think i am getting better. This one even has rhymes!
A computer?
Language? {Tenchar}

is it me...

No I'm kidding

is it the wind
